[bq="Twisty"]injustice is probably the most hardest game of all fucking time, yes even with a normal, equally noob player

mostly becase shit happens so fucking fast and its easy to just get destroyed

TL;DR injustice: gods among had me sweating from so much try hardness

and harley quinn and batwoman are the best characters[/bq]
!http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/809/341/228.png!

"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a52b126368720b6d9a3700#post_54a52b126368720b6d9a3700
[bq="Twisty"]im honestly done with valve, they are going down EAÂ´s path, except instead of putting crappy games they arent even putting games at all

of course ill still have steam cause my games are there but wont be buying anything from valve anymore, unless the game is on like 90% off sale

i hope GOG galaxy comes soon, and i hope they do something to help developing countries who cant afford to buy games priced in dollars

[/bq]
You can't really blame steam for games they distribute; that's like blaming Walmart for Age of Extinction being a bad movie.

Doubt GoG or any distributor will mark down prices for developing countries because that would raise prices in developed countries to offset the loss in revenue which would screw up their profit margin which would in turn financially fuck up their company.
